description: This file defines a 'Home' component for a note-taking application using LightningJS. It manages the display, editing, and deletion of notes, handling internal state, user interactions, and rendering of UI elements including a header, notes list, note viewer/editor, and a floating action button.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: Main LightningJS component class representing the home page of the note application.
